description.value:
Granted Powers: You are sinister and cruel, and have wholly pledged your soul to the cause of evil.

Domain Spells:

  • 1st—@Compendium[pf1.spells.71g6nmvy8qnodwyz]{Protection From Good}
  • 2nd—@Compendium[pf1.spells.zujht80bgjdk9cyb]{Align Weapon} (evil only)
  • 3rd—@Compendium[pf1.spells.ym1we9ko60qcvn4t]{Magic Circle against Good}
  • 4th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.okui7mft5bquqfrg]{Unholy Blight}
  • 5th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.xgv1e2ayf1e0br9j]{Dispel Good}
  • 6th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.c1e7f0ct04k270wy]{Create Undead}
  • 7th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.baocube6vvey9zlc]{Blasphemy}
  • 8th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.flrn1xmm2wfrxbkf]{Unholy Aura}
  • 9th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.mi52crelhwuy6bmp]{Summon Monster IX} (evil spell only)
